verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> was returned שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And it came to pass when Saul מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> from following פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <WH5046> that it was told לוֹ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> him saying הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> Behold David בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <WH4057> [is] in the wilderness עֵ֥ין גֶּֽדִי׃ <WH5872> of Engedi ס

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Then Saul שְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <WH7969> three אֲלָפִ֛ים <WH505> thousand אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> men בָּח֖וּר <WH970> young מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> out of all Israel וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> and went לְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <WH1245> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> David וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH376> and his men עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> upon צוּרֵ֥י <WH6697> the rocks הַיְּעֵלִֽים׃ <WH3277> of the wild goats

וַ֠יָּבֹא <WH935> And he came אֶל־ <WH413> about גִּדְר֨וֹת <WH1448> wall הַצֹּ֤אן <WH6629> cattle עַל־ <WH5921> on הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> by the way וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> where מְעָרָ֔ה <WH4631> where [was] a cave וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> went in שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> and Saul לְהָסֵ֣ךְ <WH5526> to cover אֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> his feet וְדָוִד֙ <WH1732> and David וַאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH376> and his men בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <WH3411> in the sides הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <WH4631> of the cave יֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <WH3427> remained

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <WH559> said אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> the men דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> of David אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> unto him Behold the day אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> of which אָמַ֧ר <WH559> said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of which the LORD אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> to you הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I נֹתֵ֤ן <WH5414> unto thee Behold I will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> [אֹיְבֵיךָ כ] (אֹֽיִבְךָ֙ <WH341> enemy ק) בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> into thine hand וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> that thou mayest do לּ֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> of which יִטַ֣ב <WH3190> to him as it shall seem good בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> unto thee וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> arose דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> Then David וַיִּכְרֹ֛ת <WH3772> and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> כְּנַֽף־ <WH3671> the skirt הַמְּעִ֥יל <WH4598> robe אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of which לְשָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> of Saul's בַּלָּֽט׃ <WH3909> privily

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And it came to pass afterward כֵ֔ן <WH3651> after that וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> smote לֵב־ <WH3820> heart דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> that David's אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> עַ֚ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he כָּרַ֔ת <WH3772> him because he had cut off אֶת־ <WH853> כָּנָ֖ף <WH3671> skirt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> his לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> Saul's ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> And he said לַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <WH582> unto his men חָלִ֧ילָה <WH2486> forbid לִּ֣י מֵֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God אִם־ <WH518> should אֶעֱשֶׂה֩ <WH6213> that I should do אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֨ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> this לַֽאדֹנִי֙ <WH113> unto my master לִמְשִׁ֣יחַ <WH4899> anointed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God לִשְׁלֹ֥חַ <WH7971> to stretch forth יָדִ֖י <WH3027> mine hand בּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since מְשִׁ֥יחַ <WH4899> against him seeing he [is] the anointed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיְשַׁסַּ֨ע <WH8156> stayed דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> So David אֶת־ <WH853> אֲנָשָׁיו֙ <WH376> his men בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> with these words וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not נְתָנָ֖ם <WH5414> and suffered לָק֣וּם <WH6965> them not to rise אֶל־ <WH413> against שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> against Saul וְשָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> But Saul קָ֥ם <WH6965> rose up מֵהַמְּעָרָ֖ה <WH4631> out of the cave וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> and went בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> on [his] way ס

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> also arose דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> David אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> after כֵ֗ן <WH3651> after that וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> afterward and went out [מִן־ <WH4480> at המערה כ] (מֵֽהַמְּעָרָ֔ה <WH4631> cave ק) וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> and cried אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> behind שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> Saul לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> My lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיַּבֵּ֤ט <WH5027> looked שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And when Saul אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> behind וַיִּקֹּ֨ד <WH6915> stooped דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> him David אַפַּ֛יִם <WH639> with his face אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> to the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <WH7812> and bowed ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David לְשָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> to Saul לָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why תִשְׁמַ֛ע <WH8085> Wherefore hearest אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> words אָדָ֖ם <WH120> thou men's לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> Behold David מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> seeketh רָעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH7451> adversity

הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Behold הַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> Behold this day הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this רָא֣וּ <WH7200> have seen עֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after נְתָנְךָ֩ <WH5414> had delivered יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> how that the LORD הַיּ֤וֹם ׀ <WH3117> thee to day בְּיָדִי֙ <WH3027> into mine hand בַּמְּעָרָ֔ה <WH4631> in the cave וְאָמַ֥ר <WH559> and [some] bade לַהֲרָגֲךָ֖ <WH2026> [me] kill וַתָּ֣חָס <WH2347> thee but [mine eye] spared עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> on וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> thee and I said לֹא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> I will not put forth יָדִי֙ <WH3027> mine hand בַּֽאדֹנִ֔י <WH113> against my lord כִּי־ <WH3588> for מְשִׁ֥יחַ <WH4899> anointed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for he [is] the LORD'S הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאָבִ֣י <WH1> Moreover my father רְאֵ֔ה <WH7200> see גַּ֗ם <WH1571> Indeed רְאֵ֛ה <WH7200> yea see אֶת־ <WH853> כְּנַ֥ף <WH3671> the skirt מְעִילְךָ֖ <WH4598> of thy robe בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> in my hand כִּ֡י <WH3588> for בְּכָרְתִי֩ <WH3772> for in that I cut off אֶת־ <WH853> כְּנַ֨ף <WH3671> the skirt מְעִֽילְךָ֜ <WH4598> of thy robe וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and did not הֲרַגְתִּ֗יךָ <WH2026> and killed דַּ֤ע <WH3045> thee not know וּרְאֵה֙ <WH7200> thou and see כִּי֩ <WH3588> that אֵ֨ין <WH369> there בְּיָדִ֜י <WH3027> in mine hand רָעָ֤ה <WH7451> that [there is] neither evil וָפֶ֙שַׁע֙ <WH6588> nor transgression וְלֹא־ <WH3808> have not חָטָ֣אתִי <WH2398> and I have not sinned לָ֔ךְ וְאַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you צֹדֶ֥ה <WH6658> against thee yet thou huntest אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> my soul לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3947> to take

יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט <WH8199> judge יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD בֵּינִ֣י <WH996> between וּבֵינֶ֔ךָ <WH996> between וּנְקָמַ֥נִי <WH5358> avenge יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> between me and thee and the LORD מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <WH4480> but וְיָדִ֖י <WH3027> me of thee but mine hand לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become בָּֽךְ׃

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יֹאמַ֗ר <WH559> As saith מְשַׁל֙ <WH4912> the proverb הַקַּדְמֹנִ֔י <WH6931> of the ancients מֵרְשָׁעִ֖ים <WH7561> condemn יֵ֣צֵא <WH3318> proceedeth רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> Wickedness וְיָדִ֖י <WH3027> but mine hand לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become בָּֽךְ׃

אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> After מִ֤י <WH4310> whom יָצָא֙ <WH3318> come out מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> whom is the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> ? after מִ֖י <WH4310> Whom אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you רֹדֵ֑ף <WH7291> whom dost thou pursue אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> ? after כֶּ֣לֶב <WH3611> dog מֵ֔ת <WH4191> a dead אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after פַּרְעֹ֥שׁ <WH6550> flea אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> a

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD לְדַיָּ֔ן <WH1781> therefore be judge וְשָׁפַ֖ט <WH8199> and judge בֵּינִ֣י <WH996> between וּבֵינֶ֑ךָ <WH996> between וְיֵ֙רֶא֙ <WH7200> between me and thee and see וְיָרֵ֣ב <WH7378> and plead אֶת־ <WH853> רִיבִ֔י <WH7379> my cause וְיִשְׁפְּטֵ֖נִי <WH8199> and deliver מִיָּדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> me out of thine hand פ

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <WH3615> had made an end דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And it came to pass when David לְדַבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> of speaking אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֤ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> unto Saul וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> that Saul הֲקֹלְךָ֥ <WH6963> [Is] this thy voice זֶ֖ה <WH2088> is this בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> my son דָוִ֑ד <WH1732> David וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> lifted up שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> to Saul קֹל֖וֹ <WH6963> his voice וַיֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <WH1058> and wept

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> to David צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> Thou [art] more righteous אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> You מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> are more כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you גְּמַלְתַּ֣נִי <WH1580> than I for thou hast rewarded הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> me good וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I גְּמַלְתִּ֥יךָ <WH1580> whereas I have rewarded הָרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> thee evil

[וְאַתְּ כ] (וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you ק) הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <WH5046> And thou hast shewed הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you עָשִׂ֥יתָה <WH6213> how that thou hast dealt אִתִּ֖י <WH854> for טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> well אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after סִגְּרַ֧נִי <WH5462> had delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> with me forasmuch as when the LORD בְּיָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> me into thine hand וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not הֲרַגְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH2026> thou killedst

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> if יִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> find אִישׁ֙ <WH376> For if a man אֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣יְב֔וֹ <WH341> his enemy וְשִׁלְּח֖וֹ <WH7971> will he let him go בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> along טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> well וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> Jehovah יְשַׁלֶּמְךָ֣ <WH7999> reward טוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> thee good תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> return הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto me this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what עָשִׂ֖יתָה <WH6213> for that thou hast done לִֽי׃

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> And now behold I know well כִּ֥י <WH3588> that מָלֹ֖ךְ <WH4427> that thou shalt surely תִּמְל֑וֹךְ <WH4427> be king וְקָ֙מָה֙ <WH6965> shall be established בְּיָ֣דְךָ֔ <WH3027> in thine hand מַמְלֶ֖כֶת <WH4467> and that the kingdom יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now הִשָּׁ֤בְעָה <WH7650> Swear לִּי֙ בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> now therefore unto me by the LORD אִם־ <WH518> that thou wilt not תַּכְרִ֥ית <WH3772> cut off אֶת־ <WH853> זַרְעִ֖י <WH2233> my seed אַֽחֲרָ֑י <WH310> after וְאִם־ <WH518> you will not תַּשְׁמִ֥יד <WH8045> me and that thou wilt not destroy אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> my name מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> out of my father's

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֥ע <WH7650> sware דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David לְשָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> unto Saul וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> home וְדָוִד֙ <WH1732> but David וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH376> and his men עָל֖וּ <WH5927> gat them up עַל־ <WH5921> to הַמְּצוּדָֽה׃ <WH4686> unto the hold פ
